sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.song-list
   .songs(v-for="(song, id) in currentPlaylist")
    .song
      v-divider(v-if="id !== 0")
      .videoId(:class="{current: currentSong.videoId === song.videoId}") videoId: {{ song.videoId }}
      .name(:class="{current: currentSong.videoId === song.videoId}") name: {{ song.name }}
    v-btn(@click="onDelete(song)") X
    v-btn(@click="onPlay(song)") Play
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import { VDivider, VBtn } from 'vuetify/components'
export default {
  components: {
    VDivider,
    VBtn
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentPlaylist', 'currentSong'])
  },
  methods: {
    onDelete(song) {
      this.$store.playlist.removeSongByVideoId(song.videoId)
    },
    onPlay(song) {
      this.$store.playlist.changeCurrentSongBySong(song)
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';
.song-list {
  .songs {
    @include flex-row();

    font-size: 1rem;
    color: green;
    .videoId {
      &.current{
        color: red;
      }
    }
    .name {
      &.current{
        color: red;
      }
    }
}
}
</style>
